text: COLEG, short for the Colleges Open Learning Exchange Group, was a Scottish charity organization established in January 1995Transforming Lives, Transforming Scotland : An Overview by the Review’s ‘Core Group’, Scottish Governmental Publication, June 2007 to facilitate the generation, exchange and use of flexible learning materials. It was formally incorporated in 1998. It was subsumed into other projects in 2009. While not an Open Educational Resources organization, it provided early sharing of electronic resources between different institutions. It was merged into the Scotland's Colleges project in 2009, and ultimately into the rebranded Colleges Development Network. == References == Category:Educational charities Category:Educational organisations based in Scotland Category:Defunct educational institutions in the United Kingdom Category:Defunct organisations based in Scotland Category:Organizations established in 1995 Category:Organizations disestablished in 2009 Category:1995 establishments in Scotland Category:2009 disestablishments in Scotland
title: COLEG
